Come to my workshop. I need materials.

-The Blacksmith

Combining the ancient relic fragments and the essence of the Core went without a problem. The legendary blacksmith Muhrak asked you to obtain materials for the Divine Furnace. This allowed him to complete the Vessel of the Gods, which can be used to forge the secret weapon, the Torch of the Gods, to defeat Kelsaik.

If the Divine Furnace was working, I'd be at work now, but there are certain...inefficiencies involved. We need icemarrow, firemarrow, and glacier fragments.

What do you mean, "Why?" Who's the legendary blacksmith here? Fine. Combining the relic fragments with the essence of the Core requires enormous heat, then cold. Satisfied?
"Where can I get them?"

Head to Raseri Festning in the Vale of Spires. The giants there have icemarrow and firemarrow, especially the chieftains. Glacier fragments? Collect them under the bridge from the Scorched Snowfield to Frostclaw Crag.
Excellent! This will allow you to combine the Inscribed Fragment and Essence of the Core.

Finally! The Inscribed Fragment and Essence of Core are combined! Now you can defeat Kelsaik! Go get rid of him! Oh, stop by Habere and meet the Gacius, the Castanic Engineer before you go to the Ebon Tower.

Muhurak sent you here? And you want to enter the Ebon Tower, don't you?

No one has gone near it because of the powerful malice surrounding that place. But Muhurak has asked me to install devices that would remove the malice. It is mostly gone now.
I wouldn't advise others to go in there, but you, I believe, can withstand it.
